title: Create an admin page to show the V2 API commands through introspection
description:
Now that the V2 API is in place and there's the nifty introspection end point, it would be great to display them from the UI. Someone with UI skills could create a link on the admin page that people could just click on. The commands could be displayed, perhaps in a tree view with tooltips?

The returned data has a link to the ref guide we could display too (would it hit the version they were on automatically?).

Clicking on a link could bring up the details of the commands. In the simplest form, users could just put the command in the address bar from there. More complex auto-generated forms seem possible, but just having this in place would be an enormous time-saver.

Related to SOLR-10888 which is a command-line version of something similar, they seem complementary.

comments.content: ticket cross-referencing: SOLR-5642 and SOLR-11797 both share the idea of the admin UI linking or otherwise pointing more towards the documentation
comments.author: Christine Poerschke
